segments.text: I see the woman standing by the sink, drying dishes and not paying attention to the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how focused she is on those dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children sneaking cookies from the jar behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to know she's not paying attention to them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is being really brave, standing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently for her share of the cookies, looking so cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they know their mother is too busy to notice them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame she's going to have a big cleanup on her hands soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water running down the cabinet doors, creating a real mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
